blocks.content:
# Welcome to the Dynatrace Application Security Specialist Onboarding Launchpad
This launchpad is purpose-built to accelerate onboarding for Cyber Security and Application Security Specialists by centralising critical configuration, monitoring, and governance resources into a single, intuitive interface. It offers guided access to documentation, best practices, and tutorial videos that support secure environment setup, analysing vulnerability and exposures, compliance and configuration and more.

You can view the following documentation to learn how to [Secure your environment with Dynatrace](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/secure)!
### Explore our Dynatrace University courses and YouTube playlists to help you getting started

content.title: Introduction to Application Security Concepts
content.description: This beginner-friendly course introduces the fundamentals of Dynatrace Application Security (AppSec) concepts.

content.description: Dive deeper into Dynatrace's Runtime Vulnerability Analytics to get a deeper understanding.

content.title: Elevating Security with Dynatrace Davis Anomaly Detection
content.description: Anomaly detection is indispensable in security to detect threats early or identify unusual behavior.

blocks.content:
### Documentation
--- 
 
Explore official Dynatrace documentation to access detailed guidance on Runtime Vulnerability Analytics, Application Protection and Security Posture Management, and best practices on how Dynatrace threat observability unifies and enriches security data.
#### [Application Security Overview](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/application-security-hub)
Discover how Dynatrace can help you strengthen your applications' security to ensure a secure and reliable environment.
  * [Get started with Application Security](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/application-security-hub#start-security)
    * Follow the above link to get started with Dynatrace Application Security.
  * [Runtime Vulnerability Analytics](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/vulnerability-analytics-hub)
    * Dynatrace Runtime Vulnerability Analytics enables you to detect, visualize, analyze, monitor, and remediate open-source and third-party vulnerabilities, as well as the security vulnerabilities in libraries and first-party code in production and pre-production environments at runtime
  * [Runtime Application Protection](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/application-protection)
    * Dynatrace Runtime Application Protection leverages code-level insights and transaction analysis to detect and block exploitation attempts on your applications automatically and in real time.
  * [Security Posture Management](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/spm-hub)
    * Dynatrace Security Posture Management (SPM) enables you to assess, manage, and take action on misconfigurations and violations against security hardening guidelines and regulatory compliance standards.
    
#### [Threat Observability](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/threat-observability)
Explore example use cases for Dynatrace Application Security
* [Monitor suspicious sign-in activity with Dynatrace](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/monitor-sign-in-activity)
  * As organizations embrace cloud technologies, monitoring sign-in logs is crucial for detecting anomalies, investigating suspicious activities, and ensuring regulatory compliance. Real-time visibility into login behavior helps rapidly address security risks, protect user identities, and safeguard critical resources. 
* [Atomate and orchestrate security findings](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/automate-orchestrate-security-findings)
  * Prioritization and remediation of security findings require a lot of manual effort. With so many different security tools, efficiently orchestrating the findings and focusing on the critical ones becomes impossible. Learn how to break down silos and reduce noise with Dynatrace threat observability.
* [Visualize and analyze security findings](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/visualize-analyze-security-findings)
  * Organizations use multiple security products and tools that generate security findings in various data formats. Accessing the data in a siloed approach makes the life of security analysts hard, as they must spend a lot of manual effort generating a combined security posture picture. Explore how Security Analysts can leverage Dynatrace to gain actionable insights in the security space.
* [Discover coverage gaps in security findings](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/discover-coverage-gaps-security-findings)
  * Gaining complete visibility of the validation cycle isn't easy, as the scanning products used by different teams silo. Use Dynatrace to aggregate security scans, gain complete visibility into security validations and discover gaps in your security procedures and remediate them before they become a real risk.
